message:
I don't understand the use of delta

When the Vector2 is set to (1.0, 1.0) you see it move on your screen

When it is set to (100.0, 100.0) it moves insanely fast right out of your screen

When you then add "* delta" to the end of THAT
It moves as fast as the (1.0, 1.0) speed

Why not just use the (1.0, 1.0) and save all the extra times you have to put "delta" in??
